EmailTemplate.name: 06_05_2015 Partner Newsletter June.Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Channel Partner Newsletter - June 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Cloud & Virtualization Lessons You’ll Love Take control of your cloud and virtual environments Check out the new look & feel of our Partner Portal here and if you are new to VMTurbo make sure to visit the Getting Started page. If you do not have a VMTurbo Partner account please email partners@vmturbo.com and we will be happy to get you set up! The VMTurbo VMworld 2015 Sweepstakes VMTurbo is giving 3 lucky winners two Full Conference Passes to VMworld 2015 in San Francisco, the epicenter of all things virtual. One lucky winner already got their passes, will you be next? Enter Here... Collateral OpenStack For Enterprise: The Tipping Point Cometh! Get your copy of one of our most popular e-Books as we cover all things OpenStack. The State of OpenStack 2015 Webinar If reading isn't your thing then fear not, we've got you covered. Join Eric Wright and Kenneth Hui as they discuss the OpenStack Summit, and how OpenStack and open source ecosystems are becoming a powerful part of today's enterprise environments in this free webinar. How Green is Your Data Center? It’s no secret: data centers are consuming more energy than ever before. Learn how optimize your data center in our latest e-book. Highlight: Turbofest Atlanta On Wednesday, June 17th, we will be hosting our fourth Turbofest in Atlanta, GA. The afternoon meeting will be held at the Hilton Garden Inn Atlanta Downtown followed by four private suites at Turner Field for the Red Sox vs. Braves game. We have two confirmed speakers; CenturyLink and UL Workplace and two confirmed partner sponsors; DataLink and DataBlue. We’re expecting 100 attendees. If you are interested in attending please contact: partners@vmturbo.com Upcoming Events - Kansas City VMUG User Conference – June 16, 2015 - Vancouver VMUG User Conference – June 17, 2015 - RedHat Summit – June 23 – 26, 2015 - Minneapolis VMUG User Conference – June 23, 2015 - You can view more events here: VMTurbo Events
